roleset.name: manner of motion, advance

role.descr: domain, field in which advances are made

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry stride.01, which maps to vn class run-51.3.2-1, no FN for the noun. Noun sense is more akin to "advance" arg1 is adopted from advance-n.01.

example.name: Within LVC, all args
example.text: Superpowers-1 tend PRO-1 to make huge strides in bettering the lives of human civilisation -LRB- the Romans did it by furthering democracy , the British Empire did it with the industrial revolution -RRB- .
example.arg: in bettering the lives of human civilisation
